title: 46 of 2022), after consultation with the Minister for Health, hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) 

(Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2023.

title: 46 of 2022), after consultation with the Minister for Health, hereby order as
heading: 2. The 17th day of February 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of February 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
(Capacity) 

following provisions of 
(Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 46 of 2022) shall come into operation: 

the Assisted Decision-Making 

(a) 

subsections (1), (5) and (6) of section 1; 

(b) 

section 2; 

(c) 

subsection (1) of section 98. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 February, 2023. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th February, 2023.
